Package com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.services.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
The UserService class provides methods for interacting with user data in the application. It follows the singleton pattern and delegates database operations to a DatabaseDAO instance.

      the singleton instance of UserService

      ServiceException - if an error occurs while creating the DatabaseDAO instance
